revised_title: Abstracts of Papers from the Discussion Meeting on Mathematical Genetics
tldr: This collection of papers from a discussion meeting on mathematical genetics covers various topics, including inference problems in population genetics, gene extinction and allelic origins in complex genealogies, population and quantitative genetics of many linked loci in finite populations, models of the evolution of genetic systems, host-parasite coevolution, and the evolution of altruism. The papers explore different aspects of genetic and evolutionary theory, with a focus on practical applications and data analysis.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Evolutionary Biology
